name: Can you get 10 - 10/10 Number Game The Last Hocus
name_original: Can you get 10 - 10/10 Number Game The Last Hocus
description:
Welcome to Can you get 10 - The latest generation number puzzle game is here!
It's easy to play for everyone, it is next generation 2048 type Puzzle game.
Find the same number in colorful tiles and combine them to get 10.
Just enjoy this beautiful and addictive game!

HOW TO PLAY :
Tap the adjacent tiles with same number, and they will pop up. Tap again, they will Combine in the position you tap. Try to get 10!
